Blaze set aside whatever project she was working on and replied to
Blacknightmares call. "Be there soon." She transformed to tiger form and
readily headed toward the contaminated area.

Bullet shruged his shoulders. Biological warfare was understandable but he
preferred the direct aproach. He remained silent and waited until Blaze
arrived

---------------------------------------------
Blacknightmare:

"Someone had come in in the Fortress" shouted the femme"Bullet, Ender
follow me" and opened her comm link to Blaze " Blaze follow my
signal" she ran, BlackFortress's main computer was telling her where
was the trouble.

Blacknightmare ran towards the quarters' area

Bullet followed Blacknightmares lead to the quarters section of the
fortress.

Blaze reached the bots location and transformed back to her robot form. "You
called?" she asked, wondering what this was all about. "Whats the alarm
about and how can I help?" the femm was ready for a psychological challenge.

> OOC: nope, she was working in anoter lab, out the area of high risk

> Blacknightmare:
>
> "We're dealing with a virus desinged to kill or put the bot in stasis
> lock" answered Blacknightmare "Virus was contained by that doors,
> we're not in danger here, but a bot it's dead and three in stasis
> lock... we'll need Blaze's help"and opened her comm link said "Blaze
> can you come here???"
